titles.title: Expressing the Nation's sincerest appreciation for the service of Muslim American veterans.
Expressing the Nation's sincerest appreciation for the service of Muslim American veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Recognizes all Muslim American veterans who have served the nation with honor, pride, devotion, wisdom, and courage for their sacrifices.
Calls upon the President to issue a proclamation urging the people of the United States to observe a day honoring Muslim American veterans with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
